job description:
Role: Data Scientist/Architects with Azure

Location: Atlanta, GA

Duration: 1 Year

Job Description
  • Solution design know how on big data & analytics architectures
  • Provide recommendations to customers with respect to cloud implementations/ migrations and prepare technical implementation roadmaps for Azure and visualization adoption
  • Deep understanding of Microsoft Azure and data platform technologies, BI technologies, with the technical aptitude and proven experience to learn new technologies and understand relevant cloud and visualization trends
  • Ensure scaling up of the off shore team technically and functionally
  • Should be working closely with the offshore delivery teams to ensure excellent deliveries. End to End responsibility is expected
  • SoW, agreements, negotiations, presentations, project planning with the customers
  • Create functional and technical design specifications, Azure reference architectures, and assist with other project deliverables as needed
  • Be the expert for complex issues related to Cloud, Data Warehousing, Big Data, Machine Learning, Streaming data, Business Intelligence and Data Analytics
  • Should be willing to travel across the globe on short notices, depending on the customer’s / delivery requirements
  • Strong non-functional requirements background on connectivity,
  • Azure non-functional components underpinning an Analytics & BigData architecture in Azure
  • Azure KeyVault technology & concepts like key encryption concepts as well as identify and access management concepts based on Azure Account & Azure Active Directory
